name: MOOG's Melodies
description:
Robot has a goal to be able to create musical sounds like those he hears from humans (potentially a performer playing violin or guitar in a subway station or a band performing). He aims to achieve this goal by finding synthesizer modules to add to its circuitry. As the robot finds the pieces, his song and sound become more and more recognizable as musical instruments.

CREDITS:

Ana Green - Unity Work
Anthony Barreto- Concept/Story/Puzzles
